description: Episode VII - Face to Face - We can't get enough of MichaelVincenzo. He shot for us as an exclusive for three years, and when hedecided to retire we cried so much that we caused a flood inCalifornia. When he called us to say he wanted to pick up where weleft off, we had no hesitation about taking him up on his offer. We flewhim out the next day and had a surprise for him that will knock yoursocks off. We had just finished filming Arabesque and were lookingfor another role for our hot new Arabian exclusive Sarib (you know,the stunningly gorgeous man who sucks his own cock while gettingfucked by Huessein in the Arabian market in Arabesque). We lovefilming Middle-Eastern guys, so pairing Vincenzo with Sarib was amatch made in our own erotic heaven. And boy did the sparks fly!These two guys are perfectly paired--in physical type, but also inenergy. This is one of the best scenes in Manifesto (and thatsays something, since this is one of the best movies we have evermade!) The fucking is beautiful. What more can we say?
title: Manifesto, Scene #07
